健康管理APIドキュメント¶

health_info_regist module¶

class health_info_regist.HealthInfoRegistAPI¶

Bases: object

健康情報登録API

regist()¶

ユーザの健康情報を登録する

Url:

http://localhost:8081/api/${user_id}/healthinfo

Method:

POST

Header:

Key

Value

Content-Type

application/json

Accept-Charset

utf-8

Api-Key

APIKEY
Parameters

json (string) – 健康情報登録API 要求JSON

Returns

健康情報登録API 応答JSON

Return type

string

reference()¶

Url:

Method:

GET

Header:

Key

Value

Content-Type

application/json

Accept-Charset

utf-8

Api-Key

APIKEY
Returns

Return type

string
